titleStmt.title: A spirituall purgation sent vnto al them that laboure of Luthers errour as touching the bodely presens of Christe our sauiour in the sacrament, and to al them that haue espyed the libertie of the gospel as touching theyr fleshe, yet seke not the lybertie to make free theyr spyrite from thys afore sayde errour.
titleStmt.author: T. C., fl. 1548.

titleStmt.title: A spirituall purgation sent vnto al them that laboure of Luthers errour as touching the bodely presens of Christe our sauiour in the sacrament, and to al them that haue espyed the libertie of the gospel as touching theyr fleshe, yet seke not the lybertie to make free theyr spyrite from thys afore sayde errour.
titleStmt.author: T. C., fl. 1548.

publicationStmt.publisher: By [W. Hill for] Hugh syngelto[n] at the sygne of saynt Augustyne in paules churche yearde],

notesStmt.note: Imprint from colophon; actual printer's name from and publication date conjectured by STC.
At foot of title page: Cum priuilegio ad imprime[n]dum solum.
Identified as STC 20510 on UMI microfilm reel 1528.
Imperfect; Cambridge University Library copy on reel 524 lacks I4 and is tightly bound affecting text.
Reproduction of the originals in the Cambridge University Library (reel 524) and the Bodleian Library (reel 1528).
Appears at reel 524 (Cambridge University Library copy) and at reel 1528 (Bodleian Library copy).
